Package org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jsonp

Class JsonArrayProvider

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jsonp.AbstractJsonpProvider
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.providers.jsonp.JsonArrayProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<jakarta.json.JsonArray>, jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter<jakarta.json.JsonArray>, AsyncBufferedMessageBodyWriter<jakarta.json.JsonArray>, AsyncMessageBodyWriter<jakarta.json.JsonArray>
@Consumes({"application/json","application/*+json","text/json"}) @Produces({"application/json","application/*+json","text/json"}) public class JsonArrayProvider extends AbstractJsonpProvider implements jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<jakarta.json.JsonArray>, AsyncBufferedMessageBodyWriter<jakarta.json.JsonArray>
Version:
$Revision: 1 $
Author:
Bill Burke
